timeline.message: Report more descriptive message from the SlackSelfHealingNotifier (#1136)

timeline.bodyText: Nit: Extra space after = and before String.
timeline.author: efeg

timeline.bodyText:
Is it possible to

Avoid having an extra space after new line, and
Prefer %n rather than \n. -- please see https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1883345/whats-up-with-javas-n-in-printf

Maybe something like the following?
        String text = String.format("%s detected %s. Self healing %s.%s", anomalyType, anomaly,
                                    _selfHealingEnabled.get(anomalyType) ? String.format("start time %s", toDateString(selfHealingStartTime))
                                                                         : "is disabled",
                                    autoFixTriggered ? "%nSelf-healing has been triggered." : "");
timeline.author: efeg
